description.default: This small study is filled with crackling energy. Books line the walls and strange contraptions hiss and spark on a workbench. A stern-looking elementalist watches you enter.

objects.all_quests_done_message: The elementalist scoffs. 'I have no more time for apprentices. Be gone.'
objects.description: A stern-looking elementalist with crackling energy around their fingertips. They seem focused on their research.
objects.name: an elementalist
